featured.text: And in 1994, Microsoft CEO (chief executive officer) Bill Gates paid $30.8 million for a handwritten notebook penned by Leonardo da Vinci.

definition.zh_def: 文藝復興時期的意大利畫家、科學家和發明家，最著名的作品包括《蒙娜麗莎》和《最後的晚餐》。
definition.en_def: An Italian polymath of the Renaissance, known for his contributions to art, science, and invention, with famous works including the 'Mona Lisa' and 'The Last Supper.'
definition.example: Leonardo da Vinci is often regarded as one of the greatest artists of all time.
